title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description:
Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

OB: It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown.

EB: The update of the checked state of the table should be instantaneous. A busy cursor should be shown during the update process.

SR: 
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the table with checkboxes.
3. Observe the time it takes to update the checked state of the table when a checkbox is clicked.
4. Verify that a busy cursor is shown during the update process.
5. Repeat steps 3-4 with multiple checkboxes to ensure consistent behavior.
